name: Folk Lore
description:
Folk-Lore is a collection of short horror games based on real folklore.

I currently only have the first game done Green Lake.

If you enjoy my work please let me know and join my Patreon for quicker releases and walkthroughs. If you find bugs or other issues

please let me know!.

How to play-

WASD- moves

E-Interacts

Mouse-Moves camera.

(Sometimes the key bored gets undone but you can fix the WASD control in the main menu under options)

Look sensitivity can be adjusted in the main menu.

Have Fun playing!

Change log- 

V2.0.5  Plugin updates

V2.0.2 bug fixes

V2 Adds in story two, Eye of the moon.

https://www.patreon.com/TheJollyElfGames
